results.name: Smallest prime p(k) such that the number of distinct prime divisors of all composite numbers between p(k) and p(k+1) is n.
link: T. D. Noe and Donovan Johnson, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..257 (first 200 terms from T. D. Noe)
